akn:content.akn:p: (a) New devices For the items described in this paragraph, such report shall disaggregate the number of devices by pediatric subpopulation.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Determination of pediatric effectiveness based on similar course of disease or condition or similar effect of device on adults

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Determination of pediatric effectiveness based on similar course of disease or condition or similar effect of device on adults
